fgo:PotionID.NAME: Some Kind of Potion
DESCRIPTIONS: Exactly how depends on the potion, and you can set it up however you want.

fgo:ElixirofRejuvenation.NAME: 返老还童的灵药
DESCRIPTIONS: 点生命。移除你身上的所有负面效果。这瓶药水无法在战斗外饮用。

fgo:ExtremelySpicyMapoTofu.NAME: 罐装特辣麻婆豆腐
DESCRIPTIONS: 获得 #b80% #y宝具值 或 #b60% #y宝具威力 。
